revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Melemele Meadow |image = [[File:Melemele Meadow.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Melemele Meadow. |tokens = 825,000 |location = Melemele Woods Megadungeon. }}
<!--T:2--> '''Melemele Meadow''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 5x5 in size, respectively; including 15 chest tiles, 36 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 11,769,270 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Caterpie.png|40px]] Caterpie ||rowspan=7|<center>[[File:Actor.png|40px]] Actor Meredith || rowspan=7|<center>[[File:Oricorio (Pom-pom).png|40px]] Oricorio (Pom-pom) |- | [[File:Metapod.png|40px]] Metapod |- | [[File:Butterfree.png|40px]] Butterfree |- | [[File:Cottonee.png|40px]] Cottonee |- | [[File:Petilil.png|40px]] Petilil |- | |[[File:Cutiefly.png|40px]] Cutiefly |- | [[File:Buzzwole.png|40px]] '''Buzzwole*''' |}
<!--T:6--> '''*Note:''' Must be unlocked by doing [[Quests#Ultra Beast Hunt|Ultra Beast Hunt]] Quest first.
<!--T:7--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Flabébé (Red).png|50px]] Flabébé (Red) ||rowspan=2|<center>58,846,350 || rowspan=2 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Oricorio (Pom-pom).png|50px]] Oricorio (Pom-pom) |- |}
